lore: When the Djinns rebelled, they did not do it alone. A large number of Magi, completely deranged, created two terrible creatures. The Vengeful Djinn was to be the ultimate Djinn, a being imbued with the power of a Nether Orb that would punish the humans who tried to enslave them. However, they were forced to stop its creation before it was ready. The result was a vile, ghostly entity that materialized the deepest fear of whoever was in front of it, even if it was another Djinn or a creature.
menagerieDialog: Make a wish. The only rule is that you can't wish for more wishes.
The most powerful weapon is deceit. You'd do well to remember that.
I don't trust Everett. I think it's because his haircut is terrible.
Make a wish, then blow out the fire on my head.
Your creatures would be nothing without my support. You're welcome.
name: Vengeful Djinn
